1.name: Bloody Cultist
1.description: A cultist in dark red robes stained in blood holding a wicked looking dagger.

actions.start: The Bloody Cultist looks at you startled and yells something in a strange tongue.
actions.attack: The Bloody Cultist lunges at you with his dagger, attempting to slice at your arteries with suprising persision.

2.name: Wailing Ghoul
2.description: A disgusting figure surrounded by cat food and glue, he wails for the day man that could not manage to protect this little boys soul.

actions.start: The Ghoul wails as he writhes on the ground, like some sort of detestable creature known for slithering along the ground during the night.
actions.attack: The Ghoul lunges forward quicker than expected, grabbing at you with it's filthy claws.

3.name: Crazed Cultist
3.description: A cultist in dark red robes with a mad look in his eyes.

actions.start: The Crazed Cultist unsheaths a menacing looking dagger.
actions.attack: The Crazed Cultist lunges at you with his dagger, slicing furiously at your face.
